title: Diploma in VMware and vSphere 6.5 Administration
headline: This free online course on VMware vSphere 6.5 administration discusses virtualization for system administration.
description: This free online Diploma course on VMware vSphere 6.5 takes you through the foundation of the Software-Defined Data Center and introduces you to the concepts and technologies that influence virtualization infrastructure design as well as the many methods used in improving server technology. You will learn all about the skills and mechanics you need to get you started and successfully administer VMware vSphere 6.
courseDescription:
VMware vSphere is the foundation of the Software-Defined Data Center and vSphere 6.5 extends your ability to virtualize scale-up and scale-out applications, redefine the availability, and simplify your virtual data center. This Diploma in VMware vSphere 6.5 course will help you to learn advanced virtualization concepts, especially if you are in system administration and need to work with vSphere virtualization. An important objective of this VMWare course is to instil the knowledge required for you to do your job efficiently and effectively, starting from installation to real-world troubleshooting issues. The course covers the powers of using VMware technology and the entire concept of virtualization as well as third-party tools and technologies that enhance VMware capabilities. 

The many concepts and themes you will get to grips with in this free online VMWare course kicks off with the installation and configuration of the ESXi hypervisor, ESXi host management network, virtual and physical networking, and building NIC teams for fast, reliable networking. This leads into learning how the ESXi uses file-shares for virtual machine backups, as a repository for installing media images or hosting VM clones or templates, and which file formats are supported by ESXi. Connection issues often occur when you use ESXi technology and you will also learn how to connect and disconnect from file-shares as well as best practices for achieving high performance. Have you ever wondered how critical virtual machines are in network systems administration? This will be comprehensively answered as you study how to build virtual machines as well as the features and capabilities of the virtual hardware layer. This includes real-life examples of how to install a guest Operating System (OS) into your new VM and the purpose and benefits of VMware Tools. The vSphere Replication is a hypervisor-based, asynchronous replication solution for vSphere virtual machines and is fully integrated with VMware vCenter Server and the vSphere Web Client. The course content covers in-depth the entire process of vSphere replication and the relatively new VMWare concept called VMware site recovery manager which is a continuity and disaster recovery solution and helps in planning, testing, and running the recovery of virtual machines. 

Do you need to work with vSphere virtualization? Are you in computer programming and want to learn how to create vSphere Virtual Machines or looking at opportunities for gaining professional skills in order to earn more money? This course is a sure pathway to success for you on your journey to becoming a certified expert in professional virtualization. Enrol for this VMWare vSphere course and gain critical virtualization knowledge that drives better business outcomes and enables business agility.
